titlestmt.titleproper: Peerless Wire & Fence Company records, Inclusive: 1935, undated

note.p: Â© 2021 The Texas Collection. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary
did.abstract: The Peerless Wire & Fence Company records contain publicity materials for the company based out of San Angelo, Texas, including letters and pamphlets.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: The Peerless Wire & Fence Company was based out of Adrian, Michigan. Before assuming that name, it was referred to as the Lamb Wire Fence Company. The Peerless Wire & Fence Company had three factories based out of Cleveland, Ohio, Adrian, Michigan, and Memphis, Tennessee. At some point, they must have also had a business office in San Angelo, Texas. They prided themselves on supplying fences, gates, barbed wire, posts, roofing, and paints directly from factory to farmer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Peerless Wire & Fence Company records contain materials from 1935 and some undated items. The papers are mostly advertising and marketing materials trying to sell ranchers materials from the company. The Peerless Wire & Fence Company was from San Angelo, Texas.
Series I, Publicity Materials, contains a letter and several pamphlets from the company and their representatives.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection came to us in original order. For the current round of processing, the materials were grouped topically.
The collection currently has one series: I. Publicity Materials.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Peerless Wire & Fence Company records, Accession #4009, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Brijin Hartrick. Released on 2020-03-06.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series contains correspondence and pamphlets. The series is in poor condition.
